story:
Let me transform this resume into a career journey story:

From Sky High to HR Excellence: A Professional Journey

Starting in the clouds as a Flight Attendant and Purser for nearly a decade (1998-2007), our protagonist managed the safety and comfort of over 400 passengers while supervising junior flight attendants. Those years in the sky honed their leadership skills and ability to handle high-pressure situations with grace.

After landing, they transitioned into various customer-facing roles, starting with Administration and Customer Services, where they mastered the art of problem-solving and record-keeping. The retail sector came next at Home Shopping Network, where they discovered their passion for training and mentoring others.

A stint as a Bank Teller (2010-2011) added financial expertise to their growing skill set, coinciding with their pursuit of higher education at St. Petersburg College. While working, they earned their Associate of Arts and later completed a BAS in Management & Organizational Leadership in 2012.

Their career took off when they became a Customer Support Manager, leading a team of ten email support specialists. This role springboarded them into an Office Operations Manager position, where they worked directly with executive leadership and managed various administrative functions.

Today, they serve as an HR Manager, a role they've held since 2015. They've come full circle from managing passengers to managing people, using their multilingual abilities (Spanish and French) and vast experience to guide employees through their career journeys. They oversee everything from talent reviews to performance management, bringing a unique blend of sky-high standards and ground-level practicality to human resources.

Their story is one of continuous growth, from high above the clouds to the corporate suite, always maintaining a focus on leading, developing, and supporting others.
